intro: Parosela pulchella, commonly known as the beautiful parosela, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Central and South America. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments and has lance-shaped leaves with a smooth texture. It produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds.
